title: Video: Låpsley – Falling Short
content:
Photo: Harvey Pearson

Not sure if I’ll end up getting round to piecing together a ‘Sound of 2015’ list, however if I do, Liverpudlian teenager Låpsley will undoubtedly be one of the first names on the list.

Her recent single, Falling Short, has grown on me over the past month or so, ultimately becoming one of my favourite tracks of the year. Sleek and delicately considered, it’s a stunning indication of the sort of talent that led to her signing with XL. Check out the equally alluring video below, lifted from Understudy EP, out in January.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
